workspaces.description: Bambu Studio Bambu Studio is an open-source, cutting-edge, feature-rich slicing software. It contains project-based workflows, systematically optimized slicing algorithms, and an easy-to-use graphical interface, bringing users an incredibly smooth printing experience.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/bambustudio:latest

workspaces.description: Blender is a free and open-source 3D computer graphics software tool set used for creating animated films, visual effects, art, 3D-printed models, motion graphics, interactive 3D applications, and virtual reality.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/blender:latest

workspaces.description: BOINC lets you help cutting-edge science research using your computer. The BOINC app, running on your computer, downloads scientific computing jobs and runs them invisibly in the background. It's easy and safe.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/boinc:latest

workspaces.description: Calibre is a powerful and easy to use e-book manager.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/calibre:latest

workspaces.description: Calligra is an office and graphic art suite by KDE. It is available for desktop PCs, tablet computers, and smartphones. It contains applications for word processing, spreadsheets, presentation, vector graphics, and editing databases.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/calligra:latest

workspaces.description: Chromium is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way for all users to experience the web.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/chromium:latest

workspaces.description: UltiMaker Cura is free, easy-to-use 3D printing software trusted by millions of users. Fine-tune your 3D model with 400+ settings for the best slicing and printing results.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/cura:latest

workspaces.description: Darktable is an open source photography workflow application and raw developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/darktable:latest

workspaces.description: Ferdium is a desktop app that helps you organize how you use your favourite apps by combining them into one application.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/ferdium:latest

workspaces.description: The FileZilla Client not only supports FTP, but also FTP over TLS (FTPS) and SFTP. It is open source software distributed free of charge under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/filezilla:latest

workspaces.description: Firefox, is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary, the Mozilla Corporation.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/firefox:latest

workspaces.description: FreeCAD is a general-purpose parametric 3D computer-aided design (CAD) modeler and a building information modeling (BIM) software application with finite element method (FEM) support.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/freecad:latest

workspaces.description: GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image manipulation (retouching) and image editing, free-form drawing, transcoding between different image file formats, and more specialized tasks. It is extensible by means of plugins, and scriptable.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/gimp:latest

workspaces.description: Github Desktop is an open source Electron-based GitHub app. It is written in TypeScript and uses React.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/github-desktop:latest

workspaces.description: GitQlient is a multi-platform Git client originally forked from QGit. Nowadays it goes beyond of just a fork and adds a lot of new functionality.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/gitqlient:latest

workspaces.description: Inkscape is professional quality vector graphics software which runs on Linux, Mac OS X and Windows desktop computers.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/inkscape:latest

workspaces.description: Kdenlive is a powerful free and open source cross-platform video editing program made by the KDE community.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/kdenlive:latest

workspaces.description: KiCad - A Cross Platform and Open Source Electronics Design Automation Suite.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/kicad:latest

workspaces.description: Krita is a professional FREE and open source painting program. It is made by artists that want to see affordable art tools for everyone.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/krita:latest

workspaces.description: LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice.org.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/libreoffice:latest

workspaces.description: Lollypop is a lightweight modern music player designed to work excellently on the GNOME desktop environment.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/lollypop:latest

workspaces.description: MediaElch is a MediaManager for Kodi. Information about Movies, TV Shows, Concerts and Music are stored as nfo files. Fanarts are downloaded automatically from fanart.tv. Using the nfo generator, MediaElch can be used with other MediaCenters as well.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/mediaelch:latest

workspaces.description: Mullvad Browser is a privacy-focused web browser developed in a collaboration between Mullvad VPN and the Tor Project.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/mullvad-browser:latest

workspaces.description: MySQL Workbench provides data modeling, SQL development, and comprehensive administration tools for server configuration, user administration, backup, and much more.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/mysql-workbench:latest

workspaces.description: Opera is a multi-platform web browser developed by its namesake company Opera.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/opera:latest

workspaces.description: Orca Slicer is an open source slicer for FDM printers. OrcaSlicer is fork of Bambu Studio, it was previously known as BambuStudio-SoftFever, Bambu Studio is forked from PrusaSlicer by Prusa Research, which is from Slic3r by Alessandro Ranellucci and the RepRap community.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/orcaslicer:latest

workspaces.description: Pidgin is a chat program which lets you log into accounts on multiple chat networks simultaneously.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/pidgin:latest

workspaces.description: QDirStat - Qt-based directory statistics.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/qdirstat:latest

workspaces.description: Remmina is a remote desktop client for POSIX-based computer operating systems. It supports the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP), VNC, NX, XDMCP, SPICE, X2Go and SSH protocols and uses FreeRDP as foundation.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/remmina:latest

workspaces.description: Shotcut is a free, open source, cross-platform video editor.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/shotcut:latest

workspaces.description: DB Browser for SQLite (DB4S) is a high quality, visual, open source tool to create, design, and edit database files compatible with SQLite.
workspaces.name: lscr.io/linuxserver/sqlitebrowser:latest
